description: Standard English Math Reasoning Template for CollegeMath.
instruction: You are an excellent mathematician. Answer the following mathematical questions.

examplar_1.question: Compute the average angular acceleration and the angular displacement during the 2 seconds a rotating object speeds up from 0.5 rad/s to 0.7 rad/s.

A 35 kg child ziplines from rest on a platform 12 m high to the ground with negligible friction. In the last 8 m of the zipline, which is approximately horizontal, a braking mechanism applies a constant force opposing the motion to slow the child down so that she\textquotesingle s traveling at 2.5 m/s when she finally lands on the safety padding at the end. The padding compresses for1.5 s when the child lands on it and stops.  $\textasciitilde$  What is the magnitude of the force applied by the braking mechanism?
The $$7$$-digit number $$\overline{123P688}$$ is divisible by $$8$$. How many possible values are there for $$P$$?
What is the value of the digit $7$ in the number $32.679$?
George buys boxes of mangoes for $$$16$$ each and sells them for $$$23$$ per box. How many boxes of mangoes would he have to sell to make $$$56$$?

Find a whole number between $$0$$ and $$100$$ that has the following properties.  When the number is divided by $$5$$ the remainder is $$4$$.  When the number is divided by $$6$$ the remainder is $$0$$.  When the number is divided by $$7$$ the remainder is $$0$$.  What is the number?

l am a four$$-$$digit number. The digit in the ones place is $$9$$. The digit in the thousands place has a value of $$1000$$. The digit in the tens place is twice the digit in the hundreds place. What number am I?

Without calculating, determine if the following sums are odd or even.  $$25\times 3$$ is an~\uline{~~~~~~~~~~}~number，$$45\times 2$$ is an~\uline{~~~~~~~~~~}~number，$$33\times 5\times 7\times 9\times 8\times 11\times 13$$ is an~\uline{~~~~~~~~~~}~number． ~\hspace{0pt}\hspace{0pt}\hspace{0pt}\hspace{0pt}\hspace{0pt}\hspace{0pt}
